title: A Dream Called Khushi
overview: Against all odds, a Rohingya refugee fights for education in Bangladeshâ€™s camps. When she meets AP journalist Rishabh Jain, her story ignites public outrage, revealing her resilience and the plight of Rohingya refugees denied basic rights. Dreaming of a life in Canada, where she can study, will she be the one in a million to break free?
